Package test

Class LevelManager

java.lang.Object
test.LevelManager
public class LevelManager
extends java.lang.Object
For handling all the logics that are related to levels

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getLevel()
    Get the value of current level
    boolean hasLevel()
    Check whether there is still level
    Brick[][] makeLevels​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
    Make different kinds of brick according to the level
    void nextLevel()
    Up level by one and set the brick count to its initial value
    If it is level 5 or level 6, make block1 and block2 visible and set the ball's XSpeed and YSpeed to 4

    • makeLevels

      public Brick[][] makeLevels​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
      Make different kinds of brick according to the level
      Parameters:
      drawArea - Area of the wall screen
      brickCount - Brick count
      lineCount - line count for brick
      brickDimensionRatio - Dimension ratio of a brick
      Returns:
      Brick object

    • nextLevel

      public void nextLevel()
      Up level by one and set the brick count to its initial value
      If it is level 5 or level 6, make block1 and block2 visible and set the ball's XSpeed and YSpeed to 4

    • hasLevel

      public boolean hasLevel()
      Check whether there is still level
      Returns:
      true/false
